DOC.brief_summary: This study is a feasibility study. Patients with acute abdominal pain who are planning to undergo a diagnostic laparoscopy are asked to participate in the study. The aim of the study is to evaluate if transgastric peritoneoscopy is feasible.
DOC.criteria: Patient with acute abdominal pain Patient under 18 Patient who cannot understand information in Swedish Patients previously operated in upper part of the abdomen
